summary: Turkish Restaurant with eat in or take out.

comments.text: This is a Turkish Restaurant and I had turkish pizza called a lahnacun wish is a small pizza , this a mince meat pizza unfortunately I felt that this was not values for money , the food quality was good it was just a bit expensive. it has a great atmosphere worth outside setting, I sat outside and it is situated on a quite street. so Price wise I would not recommend it but quality wise I would
Haz is the place to go for Turkish food in London. Meze are delicious and a great option to share with friends. Portions are quite large and the value for money is also very good.
Delicious tender meat grilled to perfection, paired with friendly and attentive service. I will be back.

summary: Cafe specialising in coffee and snacks.  Has eat in or take out.

comments.text: Worst Iced Coffee Ever! Staff here are hopeless, avoid this Costa and go across the road to Starbucks!
